wordGroup: communist manifesto 共产党宣言（现代共产主义学说发展史上的第一部经典，由马克思和恩格斯合著）

sentences.en: The Republicans are currently drawing up their election manifesto.
sentences.cn: 共和党人目前正在起草他们的竞选宣言。

sentences.en: He succinctly summed up his manifesto as "Work hard, train hard and play hard."
sentences.cn: 他把自己的宣言简明地概括成了“努力工作，努力训练，努力玩耍。”

sentences.en: The manifesto is long-winded, repetitious and often ambiguous or poorly drafted.
sentences.cn: 这篇宣言长篇大论，内容叠床架屋，词句常常含混不清或不知所云。
